title: Daegu Dream
synopsis: Daegu Dream is a fast‑paced thriller set in Itaewon: trust is scarce, and every choice has a price. Secrets, lies, and late‑night ramen ensue.

title: Road of Jeju
synopsis: Road of Jeju follows two unlikely allies who collide after a chance meeting—what begins as rivalry soon turns into something deeper. Expect sharp banter, found family, and a soundtrack that lingers.

title: Secret Shadow
synopsis: At a restaurant, Secret Shadow explores friendship, failure, and a second chance that arrives at the worst time. Secrets, lies, and late‑night ramen ensue.

title: The Crimson Time
synopsis: A tender, witty story about family, ambition, and the cost of secrets, The Crimson Time blends laughter with late‑night tears. Bold, moody, and unexpectedly funny.
